operation.name: Insert
operation.sql: INSERT INTO user_dialogs (user_id, peer_type, peer_id, created_at) VALUES (:user_id, :peer_type, :peer_id, :created_at)

operation.name: SelectPinnedDialogs
operation.sql: SELECT peer_type, peer_id FROM user_dialogs WHERE user_id=:user_id AND is_pinned = 1

operation.name: CheckExists
operation.sql: SELECT id FROM user_dialogs WHERE user_id=:user_id AND peer_type = :peer_type AND peer_id = :peer_id

operation.name: SelectDialogsByUserID
operation.sql: SELECT peer_type, peer_id, is_pinned, top_message, read_inbox_max_id, read_outbox_max_id, unread_count, unread_mentions_count FROM user_dialogs WHERE user_id=:user_id
